name: Apple Juice
details:
Apple juice is a food and drink item. Five are given by the Old Woman as a reward during the quest "A Frying Pan, Spick and Span". It is also sold in various quantities by certain merchants:
1 sold by Stjepan 
1 sold by the innkeep at The Golden Sturgeon
10â€“20 sold by Marquise Serenity
1 sold by the madame at Crippled Kate's
1 sold by the innkeep at The Chameleon
